page.title: 20A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A VET
page.content: My Dad is called John and he is a Veterinary Surgeon, in Odiham. His surgery is at Colt Hill, opposite to the War Memorial. He goes to work at 8.30, in the morning. He checks the answer-phone for calls. Then, he attends to the animals, whose owners have made appointments at the surgery. He travels to Fleet, along the A287, Farnham road, to another surgery. When the surgery is over, he visits the farms to see the animals. After a quick lunch, he continues his visits before the surgery opens at 2.00 pm, in Odiham. He has more visits before going to Fleet for an evening surgery. He is on call, one night in four. There are four Vets in the practice. Acknowledgments. To the parents,children,teachers and friends of Mayhill Junior School,who so willingly helped with this project.
